name: Icejade Creation Aegirocassis
text: A monster equipped with this card gains 400 ATK/DEF for each banished monster. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Icejade Creation Aegirocassis" per turn, and only once that turn. If this card is in your hand or GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Icejade" monster you control; equip this card to that monster you control. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can Special Summon this card.
